text: Add Multi subject dictionary learning based on [Varoquaux et al. 2011](https://hal.inria.fr/inria-00588898/) along with tests, example and documentations.
title: Add dictionary learning

text:
Let's start with a simple l1-penalized dict learning, before full blown
MSDL.

G
